name: MG10 COMBO
description: MG10 is a versatile mixer suitable for a wide range of users and applications. Input channels: 10 Line Inputs (4 mono, 3 stereo), 4 Mic Inputs with 48V phantom power and HPH per channel. Output channels: 2 ST, 1 MONITOR, 1 AUX send, 1 PHONES.

name: MG15G COMBO
description: 15-watts offers enough power for practice sessions. Custom 8" speaker provides classic British tone. Clean and Overdrive channels give you different sonic textures. 3-band EQ provides broad sound shaping.

name: MG15GFX COMBO
description: The Marshall MG15GFX 15W 1x8" Guitar Combo Amp offers guitarists an impressive range of tones and effects in a portable package. Four channels—clean, crunch, overdrive 1 and overdrive 2—provide a variety of tones from pristine cleans to heavy distortion.

name: MG15GR COMBO
description: The Marshall MG15GR 15W 1x8" Guitar Combo Amp offers guitarists an impressive range of tones and effects in a portable package. Four channels—clean, crunch, overdrive 1 and overdrive 2—provide a variety of tones from pristine cleans to heavy distortion.

name: MG30GFX COMBO
description: The Marshall MG30GFX is a 30W amp that captures the iconic Marshall sound. Featuring clean, crunch, OD1, and OD2 channels with customizable tones, it offers versatility for various playing styles. The 10” speaker delivers a powerful sound suitable for rehearsals and stage performances.

name: MG500FX COMBO
description: The MG50GFX is loaded with pure Marshall tone. You get your choice of Clean, Crunch, OD1, and OD2 channels that you can shape with a 3-band EQ. You also get integrated reverb, delay, and digital effects. Best of all, each channel's settings are storable and recallable.

name: STUDIO JTM HEAD
description: From its legendary warm and smooth tone to blending the voices for a combination of crunch and clean, the Studio JTM brings the outstanding sound that Marshall is so well known for. The smaller scale of the Studio JTM gives players the power of the authentic Marshall tone, in a more compact design.

name: STUDIO CLASSIC HEAD
description: The Studio Classic is loaded with all the player-friendly features you need, including a master volume, 3-band EQ with Presence control, preamp volume, effects loop, and DI output. You also get a power reduction circuit for attaining cranked-up tones without violating a noise ordinance.

name: MIDDLETON BLACK AND BRASS
description: The Studio Classic is loaded with all the player-friendly features you need, including a master volume, 3-band EQ with Presence control, preamp volume, effects loop, and DI output. You also get a power reduction circuit for attaining cranked-up tones without violating a noise ordinance.

name: JCM800 2203 VINTAGE REISSUE HEAD
description: The Marshall JCM800 2203 Guitar Tube Amplifier Head is a one channel, all valve amplifier with no reverb or built-in effects. The Marshall JCM800 2203 Amplifier Head features an easy to use interface and a Series Effects Loop with a true bypass switch, this takes the loop completely out of the circuit.

name: ALPHA 9 III
description: The α9 III is packed with a high-precision image stabilisation unit, advanced gyro sensors, and optimised image stabilisation algorithms to effectively detect and correct camera shake, offering 8.0-step 9 stabilisation.

name: ALPHA 7 CR
description: The Sony a7CR's advanced imaging system is powered by a 61MP Full-Frame Exmor R CMOS sensor and the BIONZ XR processor, a potent combination of incredible resolution with high clarity, low noise, and a wide 15-stop dynamic range.

name: ALPHA 6700
description: The α6700 represents a new generation of APS-C camera bodies with a futuristic fusion of AI-based recognition technology, superlative α-series still image quality, plus moviemaking features and performance from Sony's acclaimed Cinema Line. Still images: Approx. 26.0 megapixels max.

name: ALPHA 7 III
description: Refined for improved speed and low-light performance, a new 24.2MP Exmor R BSI CMOS sensor and BIONZ X processor benefit image quality, video capabilities, and AF performance. The a7 III also sports a revised body design, with a new touchscreen LCD, improved EVF, larger battery, and dual memory card slots.

name: MAJOR V BLACK
description: Marshall has launched the long-awaited Major V wireless headphones and Minor IV TWS earbuds. The products come years after their predecessors hit the market. The Marshall Major IV came in 2020, while the Minor III launched in 2021. So the refreshed lineup has been long overdue.

name: MAJOR IV BLACK
description: Major IV delivers the signature Marshall sound that you've come to expect. Over 60 years of knowledge is packed into Major IV for an explosive sound. Custom-tuned dynamic drivers deliver roaring bass, smooth mids and brilliant treble for a rich, unrivalled sound that you'll never want to turn off.

name: MAJOR IV BROWN
description: Major IV delivers the signature Marshall sound that you've come to expect. Over 60 years of knowledge is packed into Major IV for an explosive sound. Custom-tuned dynamic drivers deliver roaring bass, smooth mids and brilliant treble for a rich, unrivalled sound that you'll never want to turn off.

name: MONITOR II A.N.C. BLACK
description: The Monitor II ANC are an over-ear model that offers up to 30 hours of playtime with the active noise cancelling activated while the Mid ANC are an on-ear model that offers up to 20 hours of wireless playtime with the active noise cancelling activated.

name: MODE
description: Mode delivers huge sound in a small package. Custom-tuned dynamic drivers produce rich, powerful audio. Mode's unique design anchors to your ear and the four ear tip sizes allow you to find the right fit for you.

name: MODE EQ
description: Mode EQ offers a huge sound in a small package - featuring customized drivers delivering high-output sound at minimal distortion. The unique in-ear design anchors to your ear, while still providing a comfortable fit featuring interchangeable size sleeves in S, M, L, and XL ensure a custom fit.

name: APPLE AIRPODS 2 WHITE
description: With plenty of talk and listen time, voice-activated Siri access, and an available wireless charging case, AirPods deliver an incredible wireless headphone experience. Simply take them out and they're ready to use with all your devices.

name: APPLE AIRPODS MAX SPACE
description: AirPods Max combine high-fidelity audio with industry-leading Active Noise Cancellation to deliver an unparalleled listening experience. Each part of their custom-built driver works to produce sound with ultra-low distortion across the audible range.

name: APPLE AIRPODS MAX SILVER
description: AirPods Max combine high-fidelity audio with industry-leading Active Noise Cancellation to deliver an unparalleled listening experience. Each part of their custom-built driver works to produce sound with ultra-low distortion across the audible range.

name: APPLE AIRPODS 3 WHITE MAGSAFE
description: AirPods (3rd generation) are sweat and water resistant for non-water sports and exercise, and are IPX4 rated. Sweat and water resistance are not permanent conditions. Size and weight vary by configuration and manufacturing process. Battery life depends on device settings, environment, usage and many other factors.

name: EMBERTON II CREAM
description: Emberton II offers 30+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Its compact size, rugged durability and reliable playtime, make it perfect to take with you. When you're out of battery, Emberton II won't keep you waiting long – plug in your speaker and return to full battery in 3 hours.

name: MINOR III BLACK
description: Minor III has powerful 12 mm drivers, custom-tuned to deliver enhanced bass, smooth mids and clear highs. The earbuds are IPX4-rated, which means they are resistant to being splashed with water, e.g., rain. They cannot be rinsed or fully submerged under water.

name: MINOR III BURGUNDY
description: Minor III has powerful 12 mm drivers, custom-tuned to deliver enhanced bass, smooth mids and clear highs. The earbuds are IPX4-rated, which means they are resistant to being splashed with water, e.g., rain. They cannot be rinsed or fully submerged under water.

name: MINOR III CREAM
description: Minor III has powerful 12 mm drivers, custom-tuned to deliver enhanced bass, smooth mids and clear highs. The earbuds are IPX4-rated, which means they are resistant to being splashed with water, e.g., rain. They cannot be rinsed or fully submerged under water.

name: MOTIF II A.N.C. BLACK
description: The Marshall Motif II ANC lives up to the brand's legacy with a luxurious design and impressive sound quality. The textured leather case and metallic earbuds exude quality, while the sound profile leans towards a neutral balance. Some audio brands pass on a lot of confidence to customers with just their name.

name: ACTON III BLACK
description: This new generation of the home line-up has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

name: ACTON III CREAM
description: This new generation of the home line-up has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

name: ACTON III BROWN
description: This new generation of the home line-up has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

name: STANMORE III BLACK
description: The Marshall STANMORE III has a 50W class D amp for woofers and 2 x 15W class D amps for tweeters. This offers a powerful low-frequency response, but don't expect a pumping bass. Midrange was decent for natural and detailed vocals and instruments, but it offers clear and crisp highs.

name: STANMORE III CREAM
description: The Marshall STANMORE III has a 50W class D amp for woofers and 2 x 15W class D amps for tweeters. This offers a powerful low-frequency response, but don't expect a pumping bass. Midrange was decent for natural and detailed vocals and instruments, but it offers clear and crisp highs.

name: STANMORE III BROWN
description: The Marshall STANMORE III has a 50W class D amp for woofers and 2 x 15W class D amps for tweeters. This offers a powerful low-frequency response, but don't expect a pumping bass. Midrange was decent for natural and detailed vocals and instruments, but it offers clear and crisp highs.

name: WOBURN III CREAM
description: HOME-SHAKING SOUND - Woburn III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor and fills any space with immersive, home-shaking Marshall signature sound. Woburn III has been re-engineered with a new three-way driver system, which delivers more controlled, lower-frequency bass and greater clarity in the midrange.

name: WOBURN III BLACK
description: HOME-SHAKING SOUND - Woburn III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor and fills any space with immersive, home-shaking Marshall signature sound. Woburn III has been re-engineered with a new three-way driver system, which delivers more controlled, lower-frequency bass and greater clarity in the midrange.

name: MIDDLETON BLACK AND BRASS
description: Marshall engineers use a combination of modern and vintage technologies to achieve their distinctive sound through a combination of high-quality components, including specially designed speakers, custom-built cabinets, and unique circuitry

name: MIDDLETON CREAM
description: Marshall engineers use a combination of modern and vintage technologies to achieve their distinctive sound through a combination of high-quality components, including specially designed speakers, custom-built cabinets, and unique circuitry
